item.title: My capes
item.dc:creator: @LilAyshunRox LilAyshunRox
item.description:
@LilAyshunRox wrote:

[quote=“lord killord, post:22, topic:333085”]lolz you complained about my admin cape … at least it actually looked alright and I credited the people who made the template … also I made the crown myself, I didn’t just recolour and put a stupid “A” on it lolz

This guy’s cape looks like crap, he hasn’t credited anyone and he hasn’t used his own ideas in anything … it’s all just copied from somewhere else. I think my cape is starting to look slightly better because of this.[/quote] lols, your cape isnt bad, better than what i could’ve done :x

Read full topic

item.title: My capes
item.dc:creator: @man_killerx man_killerx
item.description:
@man_killerx wrote:

You know I just thought of something fun,
Coding a whole server with a Magic8 Ball™.

Me: “Oh mystical great ball should I add a ; , Or a { At the end?”
Ball: “Neither”
Me: “Oh mystical great ball should I compile the server now?”
Ball: “No”
Me: “Oh mystical great ball should I Leave a substring open with no closing brackets?”
Ball: “Yes”
Me: “Oh mystical great ball should I compile the server now?”
Ball: “Yes”

“Compiling…
client.java:688: illegal start of expression
public final void method25(int i, int j)
^
client.java:688: illegal start of type
public final void method25(int i, int j)
^
client.java:688: ‘;’ expected
public final void method25(int i, int j)
^
client.java:688: ‘)’ expected
public final void method25(int i, int j)
^
client.java:688: not a statement
public final void method25(int i, int j)
^
client.java:688: ‘;’ expected
public final void method25(int i, int j)
^
client.java:688: ‘;’ expected
public final void method25(int i, int j)
^
7 errors
Compiling Finished.
Press any key to continue . . .”

Me: “Son of a Bitch™.”

Lol, Good enough flame? Took me forever to actually make that error. Fucking perfect compilers fix the errors.

Read full topic

Lets see… Lets see… Oh yeah! You are breaking Copyrighted laws by not giving credits to the original owners of the Logos And/Or Cape.

This puts Moparscape™ At risk from Jagex™.
They could shut us down just because of you.
